				School of Physics and Astronomy 651-766-6782 borde001@umn.edu Ph.D., University of Michigan, 1988 A.B., Princeton University, 1980 Adjunct Instructor, University of Minnesota, 2016-present Chair, Game and Application Design program, Minnesota School of Business, 2010-2016 Co-coordinator, Game and Application Design program, Minnesota School of Business, 2008-2010 Adjunct faculty, Minnesota School of Business, 2007-2008 Adjunct faculty, Minneapolis College of Art and Design, 2004-2011 Senior Research Associate, University of Minnesota, 1992-2007 Research Associate, University of Minnesota, 1987-1992 MNSiggraph Chapter (Treasurer 2008-2011, Chair 2011) Scientific & Professional Societies MNSiggraph Chapter International Game Designers Association Physics Education, Cosmic Ray Physics, Hyperon Physics, Neutrino Physics, Computer Graphics Databases
